active.description: Whether or not to show an animated effect

:avatar.description: Whether to display a placeholder for your avatar

loading.description: When true, a placeholder map is displayed. Otherwise, the sub-components are displayed directly
loading.description_zh: 为 true 时，显示占位图。反之则直接展示子组件

round.description: When true, paragraphs and headings appear with rounded corners
round.description_zh: 为 true 时，段落和标题显示圆角

:title.description: Whether to display the title placeholder

rootClassName.description: className added to the outermost layer of the component
rootClassName.description_zh: 添加在组件最外层的 className

SkeletonAvatarProps.name: active
SkeletonAvatarProps.description: Whether to show animation effect, only works when used separately with avatar skeleton
SkeletonAvatarProps.description_zh: 是否展示动画效果，仅在单独使用头像骨架时生效

SkeletonAvatarProps.name: shape
SkeletonAvatarProps.description: Specify the shape of the avatar

SkeletonAvatarProps.name: size
SkeletonAvatarProps.description: Set the size of the avatar placeholder
SkeletonAvatarProps.description_zh: 设置头像占位图的大小

SkeletonTitleProps.name: width
SkeletonTitleProps.description: Set the width of the title placeholder
SkeletonTitleProps.description_zh: 设置标题占位图的宽度

SkeletonParagraphProps.name: rows
SkeletonParagraphProps.description: Set the row count of the paragraph placeholder
SkeletonParagraphProps.description_zh: 设置段落占位图的行数

SkeletonParagraphProps.name: width
SkeletonParagraphProps.description: Set the width of the paragraph placeholder. If it's an array, it's the width of each line; otherwise, it's the width of the last line
SkeletonParagraphProps.description_zh: 设置段落占位图的宽度，若为数组时则为对应的每行宽度，反之则是最后一行的宽度

SkeletonButtonProps.name: block
SkeletonButtonProps.description: Option to adjust the button width to its parent width
SkeletonButtonProps.description_zh: 将按钮宽度调整为其父宽度的选项

SkeletonButtonProps.name: shape
SkeletonButtonProps.description: Specify the shape of the button

SkeletonButtonProps.name: size
SkeletonButtonProps.description: Set the size of the button

SkeletonInputProps.name: size
SkeletonInputProps.description: Set the size of the input
